detail_desc: Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Adjustable, shimmering on-ear headphones with a padded headband. Integral volume limiter set at 85 dB to protect your child’s hearing. Suitable for mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 3.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with concealed elastication. Unlined.

prod_name: SS body mixed single LOW price
detail_desc: Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Cold shoulder blouse in airy, patterned chiffon. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, frill-trimmed smocking around the shoulders and long, wide sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Sweetheart neckline, a decorative drawstring with gathers at the front and a seam with concealed elastication and a flounce at the hem. Lined at the front. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, stretchy cotton jersey in various designs.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, and side and back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and decorative zips on the waistband. Front and back pockets and skinny legs with a zip down the sides.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Calf-length skirt in a rib knit containing glittery threads. High waist with wide elastication, and a slit at the front. Jersey underskirt.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.

Shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap, one inner compartment and a flap with rounded edges and metal fastener at the front. Lined. Depth approx. 6 cm, height 12 cm, width 19.5 cm.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.

Running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck, cut-out section at the sides and back and wide, elasticated crossover straps at the front.

Single-button tuxedo jacket in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a satin shawl collar, button at the cuffs, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Push-up bra in patterned mesh and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for light lift and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Imitation suede sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Straight-cut, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons. Unlined.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly with a button.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, fake pockets and long legs with a tab and button.
Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in jersey with contrasting colour panels with decorative press-studs at the sides.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and tapered legs.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long sleeves, a visible seam at the back and raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide, V-neck blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, gently dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in tulle with elasticated seams for a draped effect. Square neckline with a small frill trim at the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and around the hems, and a seam at the hem with a small frill trim. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft jersey with woven details, a collar and button placket. Chest pocket with a button on the front, buttoned cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.
Hair elastic with a large bow.
Knee-length dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with flutter sleeves. V-neck, buttons at the top, a tie belt under the bust and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs, one decorated with round, smooth, flat pendants.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with extra-long sleeves.
Sandals in cotton canvas with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.

Shirt in a woven cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Narrow belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Short dress in organic cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short sleeves. Gathered seam and narrow ties under the bust. Unlined.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, double-layered, drawstring hood, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in an airy viscose weave with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Relaxed fit with side pockets and tapered legs.
Twill cap with a motif on the front, sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Nursing jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. High slits in the sides for easier nursing access. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a textured-knit merino wool blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainer socks in fast-drying, functional fabric with a ribbed section around the foot and ribbed elastication at the top for best fit.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Dog jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and at the back.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Satin sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastic and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9.5 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back, one with a small decoration.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Water bottle in patterned plastic with a screw top and wrist strap. Capacity 550 ml.
Wrapover cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with dropped shoulders, a tie-belt at the waist and long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs. Ribbed hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with frills at the front that continue back over the shoulders, and a seam at the waist.
Leggings in imitation leather with a glossy finish. Concealed elastication at the waist.

Sleeveless knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and concealed fasteners at the front. Flap chest pockets, side pockets, seam at the waist with a drawstring and rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Short, fitted blouse in crisp cotton poplin with smocking at the back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and short, voluminous puff sleeves with concealed elastication.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with a waxed finish. Notch lapels with a buttonhole, a loose yoke front and back and buttons down the front. Side pockets with a decorative flap, a detachable tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, a zipped chest pocket, a zipped side pocket and a small, decorative flap with a press-stud. Tab with a press-stud at the sides. Lined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with flounces at the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a fastening at the back.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. No buttons.
Thong body in soft microfibre with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a low-cut back, lined gusset and string back. Seamless.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with an elasticated waist and raw-edge frills at the hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, pleat centre front and gently rounded hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms.
